metadata.title: CVE-2024-35935 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:btrfs: send: handle path ref underflow in header iterate_inode_ref()Change BUG_ON to proper error handling if building the path bufferfails. The pointers are not printed so we don't accidentally leak kerneladdresses.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
